title: The Train Robbers
description: 1978, hardcover edition, Lippincott, PA. 255 pages. The author previously had a big seller with his reportage of The Story of the Andes Survivors. Here's another major success. 15 masked men, in 1963, stopped the night mail train on its way to London, and robbed it of bank notes worth 7 million dollars. Fascinating.
author: Piers Paul Read
